languages.text: "Что касается старой Риззы, то у меня для вас хорошие новости — да, сама она отправилась на тот свет, но запасы награбленного со станции никуда не делись. Один олух из ее экипажа ошивается здесь, в баре. Поговорите с ним. Вы узнаете его по идиотскому говорку и заиканию".

"As for old Ryzza, I have good news for you. Yes, she passed on, but her hoards of plunder are still on Footfall. One numbskull from her crew is always hanging about the bar. You should talk to him. You'll recognise him by his daft way of speaking and his stuttering."
languages.original_text: "Что касается старой Риззы, то у меня для вас хорошие новости — да, сама она отправилась на тот свет, но запасы награбленного со станции никуда не делись. Один олух из ее экипажа ошивается здесь, в баре. Поговорите с ним. Вы узнаете его по идиотскому говорку и заиканию".

traits.locale_text: "As for old Ryzza, I have good news for you. Yes, she herself passed on, but her hoards of plunder are still on Footfall. One numbskull from her crew skulks about the bar. You should talk to him. You'll recognise him by his daft way of speaking and his stuttering."

"As for old Ryzza, I have good news for you. Yes, she herself passed on, but her hoards of plunder are still on Footfall. One numbskull from her crew skulks about the bar. You should talk to him. You'll recognise him by his daft way of speaking and his stuttering."

"As for old Ryzza, I have good news for you. Yes, she passed on, but her hoards of plunder are still on Footfall. One numbskull from her crew skulks about the bar. You should talk to him. You'll recognise him by his daft way of speaking and his stuttering."

"As for old Ryzza, I have good news for you. Yes, she passed on, but her hoards of plunder are still on Footfall. One numbskull from her crew skulks about the bar. You should talk to him. You'll recognise him by his daft way of speaking and his stuttering."

"As for old Ryzza, I have good news for you. Yes, she passed on, but her hoards of plunder are still on Footfall. One numbskull from her crew is always hanging about the bar. You should talk to him. You'll recognise him by his daft way of speaking and his stuttering."

"As for old Ryzza, I have good news for you. Yes, she passed on, but her hoards of plunder are still on Footfall. One numbskull from her crew is always hanging about the bar. You should talk to him. You'll recognise him by his daft way of speaking and his stuttering."

languages.text: 「リザについては、いいお知らせがあるわ。彼女は去ったけれど、その貯えと略奪品はまだフットフォールにあるの。たしかバカなクルーの一人がバーでうろつき回ってたはずよ。話しかけてみたらいかが？バカな話し方とどもりですぐに見分けがつくと思うわ」
languages.original_text: "As for old Ryzza, I have good news for you. Yes, she passed on, but her hoards of plunder are still on Footfall. One numbskull from her crew is always hanging about the bar. You should talk to him. You'll recognise him by his daft way of speaking and his stuttering."

traits.locale_text: 「リザについては、いいお知らせがあるわ。彼女は去ったけれど、その貯えと略奪品はまだフットフォールにあるの。たしかバカなクルーの一人がバーでうろつき回ってたはずよ。話しかけてみたらいかが？バカな話し方とどもりですぐに見分けがつくと思うわ」

languages.text: « Quant à la vieille Ryzza, j'ai une bonne nouvelle pour vous : certes, elle nous a quittés, mais ses trésors sont toujours cachés à Castel. L'un des crétins de sa bande traîne toujours au bar, vous devriez lui parler. Vous le reconnaîtrez à son discours peu élaboré et à son bégaiement. »
languages.original_text: "As for old Ryzza, I have good news for you. Yes, she passed on, but her hoards of plunder are still on Footfall. One numbskull from her crew is always hanging about the bar. You should talk to him. You'll recognise him by his daft way of speaking and his stuttering."

traits.locale_text: « Quant à la vieille Ryzza, j'ai une bonne nouvelle pour vous : certes, elle nous a quittés, mais ses trésors sont toujours cachés à Castel. L'un des crétins de sa bande traîne au bar, vous devriez lui parler. Vous le reconnaîtrez à son discours peu élaboré et à son bégaiement. »

languages.text: “至于老莱萨嘛，我有个好消息要告诉你。没错，她确实死了，但她那些战利品还留在落脚港。她手下的某个蠢货一直都在这个酒吧里乱晃，你应该和他谈谈。只要找那个结结巴巴，连口条都捋不顺的白痴就对了。”
languages.original_text: "As for old Ryzza, I have good news for you. Yes, she passed on, but her hoards of plunder are still on Footfall. One numbskull from her crew is always hanging about the bar. You should talk to him. You'll recognise him by his daft way of speaking and his stuttering."

traits.locale_text: “至于老莱萨嘛，我有个好消息要告诉你。没错，她确实死了，但她那些战利品还留在落脚港。她手下的某个蠢货就在这个酒吧里乱晃，你应该和他谈谈。只要找那个结结巴巴，连口条都捋不顺的白痴就对了。”

languages.text: "Was die alte Ryzza angeht, habe ich gute Neuigkeiten für Euch. Ja, sie ist verstorben, aber ihre Plünderbeute befindet sich noch auf Footfall. Einer dieser Schwachköpfe aus ihrer Crew lungert ständig in der Bar herum. Mit ihm solltet Ihr reden. Ihr erkennt ihn an seiner dummen Sprechweise und dem Stottern."
languages.original_text: "As for old Ryzza, I have good news for you. Yes, she passed on, but her hoards of plunder are still on Footfall. One numbskull from her crew is always hanging about the bar. You should talk to him. You'll recognise him by his daft way of speaking and his stuttering."

traits.locale_text: "Was die alte Ryzza angeht, habe ich gute Neuigkeiten für Euch. Ja, sie ist verstorben, aber ihre Plünderbeute befindet sich noch auf Footfall. Ein Idiot aus ihrer Crew lungert in der Bar herum. Mit ihm solltet Ihr reden. Ihr erkennt ihn an seiner dummen Sprechweise und dem Stottern."

languages.text: «En cuanto a Ryzza, no sé nada. Ha fallecido, sí, pero su alijo sigue en Paso. Hay un zopenco de su tripulación merodeando que parece vivir en el bar, hable con él. Le será fácil reconocerlo: tartamudea y habla de una forma ridícula».
languages.original_text: "As for old Ryzza, I have good news for you. Yes, she passed on, but her hoards of plunder are still on Footfall. One numbskull from her crew is always hanging about the bar. You should talk to him. You'll recognise him by his daft way of speaking and his stuttering."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto a Ryzza, no sé nada. Ha fallecido, sí, pero su alijo sigue en Paso. Hay un zopenco de su tripulación merodeando por el bar, hable con él. Le será fácil reconocerlo: tartamudea y habla de una forma ridícula».

languages.text: "Koca Ryzza'ya gelecek olursak size iyi haberlerim var. Evet, Ryzza vefat etti ama ganimet hazinesi Binliman'da kaldı. Ryzza'nın tayfasından dangalağın teki, hep barda takılır. Gidip konuşun. Görünce saçma laflarından ve kekelemesinden tanırsınız."
languages.original_text: "As for old Ryzza, I have good news for you. Yes, she passed on, but her hoards of plunder are still on Footfall. One numbskull from her crew is always hanging about the bar. You should talk to him. You'll recognise him by his daft way of speaking and his stuttering."

traits.locale_text: "Koca Ryzza'ya gelecek olursak, size iyi haberlerim var. Evet, Ryzza vefat etti ama ganimet hazinesini ardında, Binliman'da bıraktı. Ryzza'nın tayfasından dangalağın teki, hep barda takılıyor. Gidip onunla konuşun. Görünce saçma laflarından ve kekelemesinden tanırsınız."
